item.title: When God Breaks Through
item.description:
This sermon was preached in 1997 in Seymour, Wisconsin. It was preached on the morning of a Packer Game - The NFC Championship in Green Bay before Super Bowl XXXI.

The gospel text is from The Baptism of our Lord B, Mark 1:1-11.

Audio is available.
